      • createKudos

        @RequestMapping(value="/create/{fromUserId}/{toUserId}/{kudosCatId}",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createKudos(@PathVariable
                                                                 java.lang.String fromUserId,
                                                                 @PathVariable
                                                                 java.lang.String toUserId,
                                                                 @PathVariable
                                                                 java.lang.String kudosCatId,
                                                                 @RequestBody(required=false)
                                                                 Kudos kudos)
        Endpoint for giving a kudo to a user
        Parameters:
        fromUserId - The PathVariable of a user id
        toUserId - The PathVariable of a user id
        kudosCatId - The PathVariable of a category id
        kudos - The RequestBody object for a kudos - must contain comments
        Returns:
        The created Kudo object
